items.title: Project Atomos
items.description: This website, built for my company, Slade Software Ltd.

items.title: Project Aphrodite
items.description: An information website and RSVP portal for mine and my partner's wedding in 2022.

items.title: Managing Docker Logs with ELK and Fluentd
items.description: Article written for Coralogix, an end client of WriteOps Ltd, that describes how to manage application logs in Docker by using the Elastic Stack with Fluentd.

items.title: Logging Best Practices in .NET Core 3.1
items.description: Article written for Coralogix, an end client of WriteOps Ltd, that talks about the best practices that can be applied when outputting application information in .NET Core 3.1.

items.title: Running Elasticsearch, Logstash, and Kibana on Kubernetes with Helm
items.description: Article written for Coralogix, an end client of WriteOps Ltd, that walks through setting up the Elastic Stack on Kubernetes using Helm Charts.
